Text: Yeah,about that,this is not all 01 issues collected,since Rorschach and Dr. Manhattan aren't out yet,so therefore your collection is incomplete...

Well, truthfully, if you follow along with "The Curse of the Crimson Corsair" stories there is a numbered release order. So far it's..

01 Minutemen 01 
02 Silk Spectre 01
03 Comedian 01
04 Nite Owl 01
05 Ozymandias 01
06 Minutemen 02
07 Silk Spectre 02
